channel.title: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?
channel.description: Im owner of Legend Scape Pk and ive almost finished coding Legend Scape 2 which is 1000 times better but i woud also like to bring it out with a new client at the same time. Sof if anyone can just tell me how to design one or where to download a program to design one it would be really helpfull!

item.title: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

bryanc u know where i can get an open source from or a class decompiler?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 06:19:48 PM[/size][hr]im creating my new client now, and if everything works i might post a tut

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

cough [glow=red,2,300]SOULSCAPE[/glow] cough

P.S. Add me on aim or msn get the ino from my profile. I need help with the compiler for it if you get yours working.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

you know where i can download an open-sourced client?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 06:06:58 PM[/size][hr]i already got a tut on editing textures i just needa get one of them open-source clients.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You have to edit the class file called class30_sub1_sub3_sub2. You cant edit Moparscape unless you have a decompiler (and then it is not even that accurate.) You have to download an open-sourced client to edit it (which is usually just a decompiled Moparscape anyways.)

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?

item.title: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

lol, wel all i wana do is change the textures so woud i edit my mopar folder to new tesxtures and let everyone download that as a client?

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Create A Client For My Server?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Rofl if you are building a client from editing an open-sourced on yourself then it is EXTREMELY complicated compared to coding servers.

If you are building one from scratch, then I would hit you over the head with a noob stick and tell you to go and get a REAL Java job if you could code that well.

Read full topic
